name: Doomguide
text: Some mistake Kelemvor's single-minded focus on destroying undeath as a doomed obsession. As a Doomguide of Kelemvor, you might be willing to grant that your focus is obsessive. But doom? Doom is reserved for the undead and for those who prevent the spirits of the dead from seeking their proper destinations.

features.blessingsOfKelemvor(11thLevel): When you spend an action point to take an extra action, you gain a +2 bonus to all defenses until the end of your next turn
features.doomguide'sGeas(11thLevel): If you use a power that has the healing keyword, you restore an additional 2 hit points
features.doomguideâ€™sResolve(16thLevel): When you drop an enemy to 0 hit points or fewer, you can immediately make a saving throw against one effect that a save can end

flavorText: You have delayed your end, unclean spirit, but Kelemvor's judgement awaits.
